items.title: 头条新闻：苹果大量设备泄露、599美元MacBook传闻及更多 (原标题: Top Stories: Major Apple Devices Leak, $599 MacBook Rumor, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# 本周苹果头条新闻：设备大量泄露、599美元MacBook传闻及更多

本周，苹果公司意外泄露了一份文件，其中包含大量未发布设备和芯片的标识符，包括新款Studio Display、Apple TV、Apple Watch、Apple Vision Pro、iPad mini、HomePod mini等。此外，还有报道称苹果正计划推出一系列新的智能家居设备和配件，以及关于一款搭载A18 Pro芯片的低成本MacBook的更多传闻。其他重要新闻包括iOS 26的又一次测试版发布、iPhone 17定价的更多讨论，以及血氧功能在美国销售的较新Apple Watch型号上重新启用。

![本周头条 2025年8月16日](https://images.macrumors.com/t/cO3tNP6xa9icQFbd3IAnyv__2fk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Top-Stories-August-16-2025.jpeg?lossy)

## 未发布苹果设备大量泄露

MacRumors撰稿人Aaron Perris发现，苹果公司在一个可公开访问的文件中留下了许多未发布设备的引用信息，提供了苹果硬件开发在多个产品类别上的具体证据。

![HomePod mini 和 Apple TV](https://images.macrumors.com/t/5rfXSM2QqAO6no_HgywubvBdNm0=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/HomePod-mini-and-Apple-TV.jpg?lossy)

以下是已发现的设备信息：

*   **新款HomePod mini**：搭载S9芯片或更新版本。
*   **新款Apple TV**：搭载A17 Pro芯片。
*   **新款Studio Display**：搭载A19 Pro芯片。
*   **新款iPad mini**：搭载A19 Pro芯片。
*   **新款低成本iPad**：搭载A18芯片。
*   **新款Vision Pro**：搭载M5芯片。
*   **Apple Watch Series 11、Ultra 3和SE 3**：芯片细节。

请注意，这些信息尚未官方确认，苹果的计划仍可能改变。

## 苹果智能家居宏大计划

本周的MacRumors Show节目讨论了苹果通过一系列新设备和Siri改进来重点发展智能家居的计划。

![带圆顶底座功能的家庭中心指挥中心](https://images.macrumors.com/t/yF4iVd55558C-ijRX_rE0B3rcXs=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Home-Hub-Command-Center-with-Dome-Base-Feature.jpg?lossy)

据报道，苹果计划在未来几年发布以下智能家居产品：

*   **智能家居中心**：预计2026年发布。
*   **桌面机器人**：预计2027年发布。
*   **家庭安全摄像头**。
*   **Face ID门铃**。

Siri也将迎来重大改进：

*   **GPT-5集成**：随iOS 26推出。
*   **更个性化的Siri**：预计明年推出。
*   **Siri重新设计**：iPhone和iPad上的Siri界面最早可能在明年进行重新设计。

此外，苹果正在开发一个代号为“Charismatic”的全新操作系统，这很可能是传闻已久的“homeOS”，它将融合tvOS和watchOS的元素，并运行在2026年的智能家居中心和2027年的桌面机器人上。

## 599美元MacBook或今年发布

有传闻称，一款搭载iPhone 16 Pro的A18 Pro芯片的低成本MacBook可能在今年推出，其价格可能低至599美元。

![低成本MacBook 特性 A18 Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FlsriKqDKDywgoAVHtKmZDuj3ag=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Low-Cost-MacBook-Feature-A18-Pro.jpg?lossy)

这款笔记本据称将配备12.9英寸显示屏，略小于较小款MacBook Air的13.6英寸屏幕。它将是2020年M1 MacBook Air的继任者，后者目前仍是沃尔玛独家销售的599美元超低成本选项。

## iOS 26 Beta 6 新特性

苹果已将iOS 26测试版的发布间隔缩短至一周，本周发布了iOS 26 Beta 6。

![iOS 26 特性](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

苹果正在对即将到来的更新进行持续改进，包括：

*   新增铃声。
*   应用打开和关闭时更快速、更富有弹性的动画效果。
*   对“Liquid Glass”外观的更多调整。

iOS 26预计将于9月向公众发布。

## iPhone 17 价格上涨传闻

每年都会有关于新款旗舰iPhone发布时可能涨价的传闻。目前传闻分为两种：一种是全面上涨约50美元，另一种是针对特定型号的上涨。

![iPhone 17 Pro 在桌子中央 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7V5xZEOQAEJ8L5CpNL6MoauphHw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iPhone-17-Pro-on-Desk-Centered-1.jpg?lossy)

最新传闻称，iPhone 17 Pro在美国的起售价将上涨50美元至1049美元，打破了苹果在该型号上保持8年999美元价格的记录。潜在的价格上涨可能带来一个好处：基础存储容量翻倍至256 GB，这与苹果几年前对Pro Max型号涨价时所做的改变相符。

此外，还有传闻指出iPhone 17 Pro将采用全铝机身，并集成摄像头凸起。iPhone 17 Pro Max的内部设计也可能泄露，显示其配备金属电池。

## 血氧功能回归美国市场Apple Watch

本周，苹果发布了iOS 18.6.1和watchOS 11.6.1更新，其中一项重大变化是：血氧功能已在美国销售的所有Apple Watch型号上重新启用。

![Apple Watch Series 6 血氧监测 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FaW95yCo3OnqZLXNo2GD5BJ7VQ8=/400x0/article-new/2020/09/apple-watch-series-6-blood-oxygen-monitoring-1.jpg?lossy)

对于在美国的Apple Watch Series 9、Apple Watch Series 10和Apple Watch Ultra 2，该功能现在通过将传感器数据发送到配对的iPhone进行计算，结果可在“健康”应用的“呼吸”部分查看。自2024年1月中旬以来，由于美国国际贸易委员会(ITC)与健康公司Masimo提起的专利侵权诉讼相关的命令，该功能在美国销售的Series 9、Series 10和Ultra型号上一直不可用。

## 其他值得关注的传闻

*   **iPhone 17系列**：预计将推出iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max。其中iPhone 17预计将保持iPhone 16的设计，但配备A19芯片、更大的6.3英寸显示屏和升级的2400万像素前置摄像头。
*   **Apple Watch重大重新设计**：据报道，至少一款将于明年推出的新款Apple Watch型号将进行“重大重新设计”，包括外观设计变化，例如八个传感器以环形排列。
items.shortSummary: 苹果本周意外泄露了大量未发布设备信息，包括新款HomePod mini、Apple TV、Studio Display、iPad mini、低成本iPad和Vision Pro。同时，苹果正积极布局智能家居，计划推出智能中心和机器人，并升级Siri。传闻一款599美元的低成本MacBook可能今年发布。iOS 26 Beta 6已更新。iPhone 17 Pro或涨价至1049美元，但基础存储翻倍。此外，美国市场Apple Watch的血氧功能已通过软件更新重新启用。

items.content:
Apple this week briefly made a file available that contained identifiers for many unreleased devices and chips, including new models of the Studio Display, Apple TV, Apple Watches, Apple Vision Pro, iPad mini, HomePod mini, and more.


In other news this week, it was reported that Apple is planning a wide range of new smart home devices and accessories, and there were more rumors about a lower-cost MacBook powered by an A18 Pro chip. Other top stories this week included another iOS 26 beta release, more discussion surrounding iPhone 17 pricing, and the Blood Oxygen feature finally being re-enabled on newer Apple Watch models sold in the United States.

Editor's Note: Top Stories was published later than usual today due to summer holidays.

Top Stories


Every Apple Device That Leaked This Week


MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris discovered references to many unreleased Apple devices that the company left in a file that was publicly accessible.


Here is everything that was discovered:
  • A new HomePod mini with an S9 chip or newer

  • A new Apple TV with an A17 Pro chip

  • A new Studio Display with an A19 Pro chip

  • A new iPad mini with an A19 Pro chip

  • A new low-cost iPad with an A18 chip

  • A new Vision Pro with an M5 chip

  • Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, and SE 3 chip details
As always, nothing is official yet and Apple's plans could change.

Apple's Big Plan to Revamp the Smart Home


On this week's episode of The MacRumors Show, we discussed Apple's plan to focus on the smart home with a host of new devices and improvements to Siri.


Apple is reportedly planning to release a smart home hub in 2026, a tabletop robot in 2027, a home security camera, a Face ID doorbell, and more. GPT-5 integration is coming to Siri with iOS 26, and a more personalized version of Siri is set to launch next year. Plus, Siri might receive another redesign on the iPhone and iPad as early as next year.

You can listen to The MacRumors Show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Overcast, or your preferred podcasts app. You can also copy our RSS feed directly into your podcast player. The MacRumors Show also has its own YouTube channel.

New $599 MacBook Could Launch This Year


We've been hearing rumors of a new low-cost MacBook powered by the A18 Pro chip from the iPhone 16 Pro, and a new report indicates that it could come in at a price point as low as $599. The laptop will reportedly include a 12.9-inch display, slightly smaller than the 13.6-inch screen on the smaller MacBook Air models.


The new MacBook would be a successor to the M1 MacBook Air from 2020, which continues to be an ultra low-cost option available only through Walmart for $599.

Everything New in iOS 26 Beta 6


Apple has moved to a one-week interval for iOS 26 beta releases, which means this week saw the release of iOS 26 beta 6.


Apple is continuing to make changes to the upcoming update, such as adding new ringtones, faster and bouncier animations when opening and closing apps, and more tweaks to the Liquid Glass look.

iOS 26 should be released to the general public in September.

Will the iPhone 17 Cost More?


As seems to be the case every year, rumors have been circulating about potential price increases coming with the launch of new flagship iPhones in September. The rumors have been split about whether we might see an across-the-board increase on the order of $50 or whether increases might be targeted at certain models.


The latest rumor claims the iPhone 17 Pro in particular will come with a $50 increase in its starting price to $1,049 in the United States, breaking an 8-year streak of Apple holding the line on a $999 price point for that model. A potential price increase could come with one benefit, however, and that is doubled base storage of 256 GB, matching a change Apple made as part of a price increase for the Pro Max model a couple of years ago.

Blood Oxygen Feature Returns to All Apple Watches in U.S.


Apple this week released iOS 18.6.1 and watchOS 11.6.1 updates with one big change: the Blood Oxygen feature is now re-enabled on all Apple Watch models sold in the United States.


On the Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Series 10, and Apple Watch Ultra 2 in the U.S., the feature now works by sending the sensor data to a paired iPhone for calculation, with the results viewable in the Respiratory section of the Health app.

The feature had been unavailable on Series 9, Series 10, and Ultra models sold in the U.S. since mid-January 2024, as a result of a U.S. International Trade Commission order connected to a patent infringement lawsuit filed by health company Masimo.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!

items.title: 底特律附近Apple Store今日永久关闭，全新市中心店即将开业 (原标题: Apple Store Near Detroit Permanently Closing Today Ahead of All-New Downtown Location)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 底特律附近Apple Store永久关闭，全新市中心店即将开业

位于底特律郊区克林顿镇（Clinton Township）鹧鸪溪购物中心（The Mall at Partridge Creek）的Apple零售店将于2025年8月16日东部时间晚上7点永久关闭。

![Apple Partridge Creek](https://images.macrumors.com/t/eHzUXUM8I2NqoLO1oO5_9KxWTO4=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Partridge-Creek.jpeg?lossy)

#### 关闭原因与背景

*   **未提供具体原因**：Apple并未提供此次关闭的具体原因。
*   **商场困境**：当地新闻WDIV去年报道称，鹧鸪溪购物中心已被出售并进入破产管理程序，当时难以留住租户。
*   **租约到期**：Apple的声明指出，公司将不再续签鹧鸪溪Apple Store的租约。

#### 员工安置与未来规划

*   **员工机会**：Apple表示，鹧鸪溪店所有受影响的员工都将有机会继续为公司工作。
*   **新店开业**：Apple已确认，其全新的底特律市中心店将于今年晚些时候开业。
*   **门店总数不变**：长期来看，Apple在密歇根州的门店总数不会改变。
*   **替代方案**：
    *   底特律北部郊区的顾客将继续由Apple Somerset店提供服务。
    *   顾客也可通过Apple.com和Apple Store应用进行购物。

#### 历史与更广泛的背景

*   **服务近20年**：鹧鸪溪Apple Store于2007年首次开业，已服务当地社区近20年。
*   **其他门店关闭**：今年早些时候，Apple还永久关闭了芝加哥郊区的Northbrook Court店，以及上周在英国和中国的门店。
*   **物业相关原因**：Apple强调，今年所有永久性门店关闭都是出于“特定的物业相关原因”，与公司整体业绩无关。
*   **公司业绩强劲**：Apple最近刚经历了一个创纪录的季度，并且正在全球范围内开设许多新店和翻新店。
items.shortSummary: 底特律郊区鹧鸪溪购物中心的Apple Store将于2025年8月16日永久关闭。尽管Apple未说明具体原因，但该商场正面临经营困境，Apple选择不再续租。所有受影响员工将有机会继续留任。Apple计划今年晚些时候在底特律市中心开设一家新店，确保密歇根州门店总数不变。此次关闭是出于物业相关原因，与Apple强劲的整体业绩无关。
items.translated_title: 底特律附近Apple Store今日永久关闭，全新市中心店即将开业
items.content:
Apple's retail store at The Mall at Partridge Creek, in the Detroit suburb of Clinton Township, will be permanently closing at 7 p.m. Eastern Time today.

Apple Partridge Creek

Apple did not provide a specific reason for the closure, but local news outlet WDIV last year reported that The Mall at Partridge Creek had been sold in receivership and was struggling to retain tenants at the time.

Fortunately, Apple said all affected employees at the Partridge Creek store will have the opportunity to continue working for the company.

Apple previously confirmed that its all-new store in Downtown Detroit will open later this year, so the company's total number of stores in Michigan will not change over the long term. Apple Somerset will continue to serve customers in Detroit's northern suburbs.

Apple's full statement, shared with MacRumors:
At Apple, we're committed to delivering an exceptional experience for all customers, and we're excited to open our new retail location in Downtown Detroit later this year. As we prepare to open, we will not continue our lease at Apple Partridge Creek, and all of our valued team members will have the opportunity to continue their roles with Apple. We've loved serving the Partridge Creek community for nearly 20 years, and look forward to welcoming our customers at our other stores in the Detroit metro area, including nearby Apple Somerset, as well as Apple.com and the Apple Store app.
Apple Partridge Creek first opened in 2007.

Apple also permanently closed its Northbrook Court store in a Chicago suburb earlier this year, along with stores in the UK and China last week.

All of Apple's permanent store closures this year are for specific property-related reasons that are unrelated to the company's overall performance. Apple just had a record-breaking quarter, and the company is opening many new and remodeled stores around the world.
Tag: Apple Store

items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 苹果正在开发全新操作系统

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，苹果公司正在开发一款代号为“Charismatic”的全新操作系统，该系统很可能就是传闻已久的“homeOS”。

### 主要特点与应用

*   **目标设备**：这款新操作系统将应用于苹果计划于2026年推出的智能家居中心，以及2027年推出的桌面机器人。
*   **设计理念**：该软件平台将融合tvOS和watchOS的元素，例如，预计将采用类似Apple Watch的六边形应用网格。
*   **核心功能**：平台主要围绕时钟界面和小组件展开，并将支持多用户功能。
*   **交互方式**：用户将主要通过Siri语音命令与系统互动，但触控也将作为可选的交互方式。
*   **预装应用**：预计将预装苹果的日历、相机、音乐、提醒事项和备忘录等应用。

### 多用户支持细节

该操作系统设计的设备旨在方便共享。它们将配备一个前置摄像头，当用户靠近时，摄像头可以扫描用户的面部，然后自动将布局、功能和内容调整为该用户的偏好设置。

### 展望

预计在未来几个月内，我们将了解到更多关于这款新操作系统的详细信息。

![Home Hub Command Center with Dome Base Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/yF4iVd55558C-ijRX_rE0B3rcXs=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Home-Hub-Command-Center-with-Dome-Base-Feature.jpg?lossy)

images.alt: Home Hub Command Center with Dome Base Feature

items.content:
Apple is developing an all-new operating system codenamed "Charismatic," according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


This is likely Apple's long-rumored "homeOS" operating system.

In a report this week, Gurman said both Apple's rumored smart home hub in 2026 and tabletop robot in 2027 will run the new operating system. He said the software platform will blend elements of tvOS and watchOS. For example, he expects there to be a hexagonal grid of apps, just like on the Apple Watch.

The platform largely revolves around clock faces and widgets, and it will have multi-user support, Gurman said. Users will primarily interact with it using Siri voice commands, but touch will also be an option, he said. Some of the preinstalled apps from Apple will apparently include Calendar, Camera, Music, Reminders, and Notes.

Here is what he said about multi-user support:
The devices are meant to be easily shared: They include a front-facing camera that can scan users' faces as they walk toward it and then automatically change the layout, features and content to the preferences of that person.
We should learn more about the new operating system over the coming months.

items.title: iOS 26 照片应用：所有变化一览 (原标题: iOS 26 Photos App: Everything That's Changed)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
iOS 26 对照片应用进行了重新设计，调整了 iOS 18 的部分改动，并更新了导航。此外，还引入了新的 3D 图像功能和其他实用更新。

### 导航

*   **标签栏回归**：iOS 18 移除了标签栏，但在 iOS 26 中，标签栏重新回归，带有按钮可在新分离的“图库”（Library）和“收藏”（Collections）部分之间切换。
    
    ![iOS 26 照片应用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ui8nJx7eIbiboH8sMngvw77L-QQ=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/ios-26-photos-app.jpg?lossy)
*   **搜索按钮位置调整**：独立的搜索按钮被移至照片应用的底部。
*   **图库视图改进**：
    *   “图库”视图提供了所有照片和截屏的概览，类似于 iOS 17 的照片应用。
    *   顶部有一个更大的“选择”（Select）按钮。
    *   筛选器和视图选项（如缩放、排除截屏和“与你共享”图片）的按钮现在清晰可见，解决了 iOS 18 中需要滚动才能显示的问题，使选项更易于查找。
*   **收藏标签页**：
    *   “收藏”标签页包含了所有曾统一显示的不同视图选项，如“最近几天”（Recent Days）、“人物与宠物”（People and Pets）、“已固定”（Pinned）、“回忆”（Memories）、“旅行”（Trips）、“相簿”（Albums）和“精选照片”（Featured Photos）。
    *   独立的视图意味着可以在一个屏幕上看到更多的收藏内容。
    *   “媒体类型”（Media Types）和“工具”（Utilities）部分下的按钮更大、更清晰，方便用户滑动或点击以获取更多选项。
    
    ![iOS 26 收藏照片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_a-WV39GP_bnsi-FTd8wsRyVXHg=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-collections-photos.jpg?lossy)

### 液态玻璃设计 (Liquid Glass Design)

*   与所有 iOS 26 应用一样，“照片”应用采用了“液态玻璃”重新设计，其效果在该应用中最为显著。
    
    ![iOS 26 照片应用界面](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JYTPA4XxbvAXuwFdY7NMI4PTwMw=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-photos-app-interface.jpg?lossy)
*   双按钮标签栏使用半透明效果，显示其背后的照片。
*   当标签栏展开为更大的导航栏（包含月份和年份选项）时，它仍然保持透明。
*   这种更透明的外观使焦点集中在照片上，而按钮则融入背景。
*   标签栏、搜索按钮、选择按钮以及照片应用中的其他按钮都具有相同的半透明效果，并采用了苹果今年采用的更圆润的外观。

### 空间场景 (Spatial Scenes)

*   iOS 26 引入了“空间场景”功能，为任何图像增添额外的深度和真实感。
*   它将主体与背景分离，当您前后移动手机时，会引入轻微的运动效果。
    
    ![空间场景 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IOOh1yjN2hdRbQx2pgJMAb1FxlE=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/spatial-scenes-1.jpg?lossy)
*   “空间场景”适用于所有照片，即使是您照片库中已存在多年的旧照片。
*   使用方法：点击一张图片，然后点击显示屏右上角的小六边形图标即可启用。
*   该功能利用生成式 AI 为平面图像添加深度，但不需要 Apple Intelligence。
*   适用于 iPhone 12 及更新机型。

### 收藏自定义

*   “收藏”部分中有一个更明显的“重新排序”（Reorder）按钮，使其更容易发现可以重新排列收藏内容。
    
    ![iOS 26 收藏重新排列](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KD3v4ddrKDurVx6-A9KIGSs6ovU=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-collections-rearrange.jpg?lossy)
*   现在可以折叠收藏，只显示收藏名称而非缩略图预览，这是一个新的界面选项。
*   顶部有一个快速访问界面选项，可以折叠所有收藏、显示所有收藏、重新排序或选择不同的视图（顶部收藏缩略图更大、所有缩略图更大或所有缩略图更小）。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 照片应用带来重大更新，重新引入标签栏，将“图库”和“收藏”分开，并优化了导航和搜索按钮位置。新增“空间场景”功能，利用AI为照片添加3D深度和动态效果。界面采用“液态玻璃”设计，提升视觉透明度。收藏管理也更灵活，支持更明显的重新排序和折叠视图。这些改进旨在提升用户体验和照片管理效率。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 照片应用：所有变化一览
items.content:
The Photos app was redesigned in iOS 18, and in iOS 26, Apple has adjusted some of those original design changes and update the navigation. ‌iOS 26‌ also includes new 3D image features and a few other useful updates.


Navigation


In ‌iOS 18‌, Apple introduced a unified ‌Photos‌ app view that did away with tabs. The Tab bar is back in ‌iOS 26‌, with buttons to swap between the newly separated Library and Collections sections in the ‌Photos‌ app.


Apple also added a separate Search button that's at the bottom of the ‌Photos‌ app, relocating it from the top.

The Library view offers an overview of all the images and screenshots that you've taken, much like the iOS 17 ‌Photos‌ app. There is a larger Select button at the top of the ‌Photos‌ interface, along with a clearly visible button for accessing filters and view options for zooming in, zooming out, and excluding things like screenshots and Shared With You images.

Filters were available in ‌iOS 18‌, but the button was hidden unless you started scrolling through the ‌Photos‌ Library, which could be confusing. The new layout makes it easier to find all of the different options in the ‌Photos‌ app.


Scrolling in the Library View continues to bring up the options to swap to Years and Months, with buttons for returning to the tab bar or launching a search.

In the Collections tab, you'll see all of the different viewing options that used to be included in the unified view. Recent Days is at the top of the app, along with dedicated views like People and Pets, Pinned, Memories, Trips, Albums, and Featured ‌Photos‌.

The dedicated view means you can see more of your Collections on one screen. The Media Types and Utilities sections under Collections have larger, more distinct buttons that make it clearer you can swipe or tap to get to more options.

Liquid Glass Design


As with all ‌iOS 26‌ apps, ‌Photos‌ has a Liquid Glass redesign. It's one of the apps where the Liquid Glass look is the most noticeable.


The two-button tab bar uses translucency to show the photos that are behind it, and when it expands into the larger navigation bar that has options for months and years, it remains clear. With the more transparent look, focus is on the photos while buttons fade into the background.

The tab bar, the search button, the select button, and other buttons in the ‌Photos‌ app have the same translucency, and use the more rounded look that Apple adopted this year.

Spatial Scenes


‌iOS 26‌ includes a Spatial Scenes feature that adds extra depth and realism to any image. It separates the subject from the background, introducing slight motion when you move your phone back and forth.


Spatial Scenes works with all photos, even those that have been in your Photo Library for years.

To use Spatial Scenes in the ‌Photos‌ app, tap into an image and tap on the small hexagon icon on the upper right side of the display. Once enabled, if you move your phone, you will see the depth effect.

Spatial Scenes uses generative AI to add depth to flat images, but it does not require Apple Intelligence. The feature is available on the iPhone 12 and newer.

Collections Customization


There's a more noticeable Reorder button in the Collections section, making easier to see that you can rearrange what you see. You can still grab and drag to reorder, but there is no longer an option to exclude certain types of collections.


Collections can be collapsed down until you tap into them, which is a new interface option. When collapsed, you'll only see the name of the collection rather than a thumbnail preview of what it includes.

There's a quick access interface option at the top where you can collapse all collections, show all collections, reorder, or choose a different view.

You can see collections in a view that makes the top collection thumbnails larger than the others, a view with all larger thumbnails, or a view with all smaller thumbnails.

Read More


We have a dedicated iOS 26 roundup that goes into detail on all of the new features that are available in the update.

items.title: Apple Watch SE 3：苹果即将推出的平价智能手表有何期待 (原标题: Apple Watch SE 3: What to Expect From Apple's Upcoming Budget Smartwatch)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果手表 SE 3：苹果即将推出的平价智能手表有何期待

苹果计划推出新一代的 Apple Watch SE，预计将与 Apple Watch Series 11 和 Apple Watch Ultra 3 一同发布。自2022年以来，Apple Watch SE 尚未更新，因此这次更新备受期待。

![Apple Watch SE 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/HYwkoywq1sqRqqZSvNy-iyN6Vyk=/400x0/article-new/2024/02/apple-watch-se-purple-february.jpg?lossy)

## 尺寸与设计

根据显示屏分析师 Ross Young 的说法，Apple Watch SE 3 可能会获得新的显示屏尺寸，预计为 1.6 英寸和 1.8 英寸。这些尺寸与当前 Apple Watch SE 2 的显示屏尺寸相差不大，但显示屏升级已是时候。

*   **外观设计：** 当前的 Apple Watch SE 2 采用 Apple Watch Series 6 的设计，提供 40 毫米和 44 毫米的尺寸选项。随着 Series 7 将尺寸更新为 41 毫米和 45 毫米，以及 Series 10 将显示屏尺寸更改为 42 毫米和 46 毫米，Apple Watch SE 3 有可能采用 Apple Watch Series 7 的设计，该设计特点是更薄的机身和更窄的边框。
*   **全天候显示：** 目前 Apple Watch SE 不支持全天候显示技术。虽然目前没有关于 SE 3 将支持此功能的传闻，但考虑到该技术已存在一段时间，苹果有可能将其引入这款低成本手表。

## S11 芯片升级

根据苹果意外泄露的信息，下一代 Apple Watch SE 将搭载与 Apple Watch Series 11 和 Apple Watch Ultra 相同的 S11 芯片。S11 芯片本质上与 S9 和 S10 相似，但相对于当前 Apple Watch SE 中使用的 S8 芯片而言，将是一个重大改进。

*   **性能提升：** 性能将显著提升，SE 3 的响应速度会更快。
*   **新功能：** 搭载 S11 芯片后，Apple Watch SE 3 有望获得设备端 Siri 处理、双指捏合手势支持以及更大的存储空间等功能。

## 可能的健康功能

Apple Watch SE 历来比苹果的旗舰 Apple Watch 型号拥有更少的健康功能，例如它没有心电图 (ECG) 应用，也没有血氧监测功能。

*   **现有功能与缺失：** SE 支持心率追踪、睡眠追踪和呼吸频率追踪等核心功能。
*   **潜在新增功能：** 如果 Series 11 和 Ultra 3 中有新的健康功能，这些功能不太可能出现在 Apple Watch SE 3 上。然而，Apple Watch SE 3 有可能增加睡眠呼吸暂停检测功能，因为它将拥有支持该功能所需的所有硬件（目前此功能仅限于 Series 9、Series 10 和 Ultra 2）。
*   **传感器升级：** 苹果可能会将光学心率传感器升级到第三代版本（最初在 Apple Watch Series 7 中引入），因为当前的 Apple Watch SE 仍在使用第二代传感器。
*   **其他改进：** 其他可能性包括改进的电池续航、更快的充电速度和更好的防水性能。

## 塑料外壳传闻

2024 年年中，彭博社的 Mark Gurman 曾表示苹果正在开发一款采用彩色塑料外壳的新款 Apple Watch SE，类似于 iPhone 5c。然而，截至今年，Gurman 表示苹果可能已经放弃了新的外壳设计方案。据称，设计团队不喜欢该设备的外观，而材料团队也难以使其成本低于当前的铝制外壳。因此，Apple Watch SE 3 可能会继续使用铝制外壳，而不是之前传闻中提到的彩色塑料。

## 价格

目前没有关于 Apple Watch SE 涨价的传闻，苹果很可能希望保持该设备的价格亲民。当前 40 毫米版本的起售价为 249 美元，44 毫米型号的起售价为 279 美元。苹果一直将 Apple Watch SE 定位为家长为孩子购买的设备，提高价格可能会影响苹果向儿童市场推广该设备的努力。

## 发布时间

预计 Apple Watch SE 3 将在苹果九月的 iPhone 发布会上公布。有传闻称发布会可能在 9 月 9 日举行，如果是这样，手表的预订可能会在 9 月 12 日开始，并于 9 月 19 日正式上市。
items.shortSummary: 苹果 Watch SE 3 预计将与 Series 11 和 Ultra 3 一同发布，作为一次重要更新。它将搭载与旗舰型号相同的 S11 芯片，带来显著的性能提升和新功能，如设备端 Siri 和双指捏合手势。设计上可能采用 Series 7 的更薄机身和窄边框，并可能升级光学心率传感器和支持睡眠呼吸暂停检测。尽管曾有彩色塑料外壳传闻，但预计仍将沿用铝制外壳。价格预计保持亲民，并有望在九月的 iPhone 发布会上亮相。
items.translated_title: Apple Watch SE 3：苹果即将推出的平价智能手表有何期待
items.content:
Along with the Apple Watch Series 11 and the Apple Watch Ultra 3, Apple plans to introduce a new version of the Apple Watch SE. The ‌Apple Watch SE‌ hasn't been updated since 2022, so it is overdue for an update.


Size and Design


The ‌Apple Watch SE‌ could get new display sizes, according to display analyst Ross Young. The device will supposedly come in 1.6-inch and 1.8-inch display sizes.

Those sizes aren't too far off of the current ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 2 display sizes, but it's time for a display upgrade. The ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 2 is modeled after the Apple Watch Series 6, and it comes in the older 40mm and 44mm size options.

With the Series 7, Apple updated the Apple Watch sizing to 41mm and 45mm, and with the Series 10, display sizes changed to 42mm and 46mm. It's possible that the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3 will get the Apple Watch Series 7 design, which features a thinner design and slimmed down bezels.

Right now, the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ does not have always-on display technology, and it's another feature that Apple could bring to the low-cost watch now that it's been around for some time. There are no rumors about always-on display technology for the SE 3, though.

Updated S11 Chip


The next-generation ‌Apple Watch SE‌ will get the same S11 chip as the Apple Watch Series 11 and the Apple Watch Ultra, according to information that Apple accidentally leaked.

The S11 is essentially the same as the S9 and the S10, but it will be a major improvement over the S8 chip that's in the current ‌Apple Watch SE‌. Performance should be much quicker and the SE 3 should be much more responsive.

With the S11, the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3 could get features like on-device Siri processing, support for double tap gestures, and more storage.

Possible Health Features


The ‌Apple Watch SE‌ has historically had fewer health features than Apple's flagship Apple Watch models. It doesn't have the ECG app, and there's no blood oxygen monitoring. If there are new health features in the Series 11 and the Ultra 3, it's unlikely the functionality will make it to the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3.

The ‌Apple Watch SE‌ does support core features like heart rate tracking, sleep tracking, and respiratory rate tracking, so Apple could add sleep apnea detection to the SE 3 because it would have all of the hardware to support the feature. Sleep apnea detection is currently limited to the Series 9, Series 10, and Ultra 2.

Apple could upgrade the optical heart sensor to the third-generation version that was initially introduced in the Apple Watch Series 7, because the current ‌Apple Watch SE‌ is still using the second-generation sensor.

Other possibilities include improved battery life, faster charging, and better water resistance.

Plastic Casing Rumors


Back in mid-2024, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said that Apple was working on a new ‌Apple Watch SE‌ with a colorful plastic casing. The device would have been reminiscent of the iPhone 5c, an ‌iPhone‌ that used a rigid plastic material instead of aluminum.

As of this year, Gurman says that Apple might have scrapped the plan for a new casing design. The design team supposedly did not like the look of the device, and the materials team was struggling to make it cheaper than the current aluminum casing.

For that reason, the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3 may continue to use an aluminum case instead of the more colorful plastic that's been mentioned in rumors.

Price


There haven't been rumors of a price increase for the ‌Apple Watch SE‌, and Apple will likely want to keep the device affordable. The current 40mm version is priced starting at $249, and the 44mm model is priced starting at $279.

Apple has been marketing the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ to parents who get the device for their children, and raising the price could impact Apple's efforts to market the device to kids.

Launch Timing


We're expecting Apple to announce the ‌Apple Watch SE‌ 3 at its September ‌iPhone‌ event. Rumors suggest the event could take place on September 9, and if that's the case, pre-orders for the watch could follow on September 12, and a launch could come on September 19.
